price: Excepto Iblís, quien fue soberbio y se contó entre los incrédulos.
arabic: إِلَّآ إِبۡلِيسَ ٱسۡتَكۡبَرَ وَكَانَ مِنَ ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: illā ib'līsa is'takbara wakāna mina al-kāfirīna
